instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: A1502 820-4924-A no power
threads.message:
Hi,
I have an A1502 820-4924-A that has green light, but no fanspin and no power.

PP5V_S4 and PP3V3_S4 are missing.
PM_SLP_S4_L is missing and R1461 is OK
PM_BATLOW_L = 3.3V
SMC_ONOFF_L = 3.4V

PCH_INTRUDER_L = 2,7V
PCH_INTVRMEN=3.1V
PCH_SRTCRST_L= 3.3V
RTC_RESET_L=3.3V

Can you help?

threads.title: A1502 820-4924-A no power
threads.message:
Fan will start very late on this model; not before CPU gets really hot.

Do you get 3V3_SUS?

threads.title: A1502 820-4924-A no power
threads.message:
Hi,
Yes, I have 3.3 on PP3V3_SUS

threads.title: A1502 820-4924-A no power
threads.message: Trigger SMC_ONOFF_L and check for drop pulse at PM_PWRBTN_L.

threads.title: A1502 820-4924-A no power
threads.message: I do have a drop pulse on  PM_PWRBTN_L

threads.title: A1502 820-4924-A no power
threads.message: Check for pulse at PM_SLP_S4_L at same time.

threads.title: A1502 820-4924-A no power
threads.message: PM_SLP_S4_L  is 0V but i have a small pulse when i triger  SMC_ONOFF_L

threads.title: A1502 820-4924-A no power
threads.message:
Check the same for PM_SLP_S3_L and all big coils.

Just in case, try starting in SMC bypass mode.
Be sure to have original 60/85W Magsafe 2 charger.

threads.title: A1502 820-4924-A no power
threads.message:
Hi,
I Have a pulse on  PM_SLP_S3_L but no pulse big coils  when triger  SMC_ONOFF_L, and on SMC bypass mode nothing happends.
With an original charger, the result is the same, no power

threads.title: A1502 820-4924-A no power
threads.message:
Trigger SMC_ONOFF_L repeatedly and check for pulse at each coil.
If no voltage pulse at big coils, then check diode mode.
Start checking L7520.

threads.title: A1502 820-4924-A no power
threads.message:
Post U7501 voltages; 23, 12, 13, 22, 29, 21.
Check for pulse at pin 4, when trigger SMC_ONOFF_L.
Use surrounding components as test points, not directly chip pins.

threads.title: A1502 820-4924-A no power
threads.message:
Hi,

U7501:
23=12.59V
12=3.4V
13=1.9V
22=3.3V
29=5V
21=3.4V

I think that P5VP3V3_VREF2 is low
 
I've got no pulse on pin 4 of U7501 when trigering  SMC_ONOFF_L.

threads.title: A1502 820-4924-A no power
threads.message:
If PM_SLP_S4_L pulses, P5VS3_EN should pulse too.
If not, check R8175/79.

"I think that P5VP3V3_VREF2 is low"
VREF2 means something, don't you think?

threads.title: A1502 820-4924-A no power
threads.message: Well, i've never thinked about that, but now that you mentioned, i think that this means Reference Value. Is that correct?

threads.title: A1502 820-4924-A no power
threads.message: 2V internal reference, to be more precisely; so is good in your case.

threads.title: A1502 820-4924-A no power
threads.message:
Tks, for the explanation about VREF.

I do have a pulse on pin 4 of U7501 when Trigering  SMC_ONOFF_L. Sorry, I was trigering on the wrong place...

threads.title: A1502 820-4924-A no power
threads.message:
Then you should have pulse at L7520 too.
If not, there is a problem in U7501 5V area.
Check all resistors and traces.

threads.title: A1502 820-4924-A no power
threads.message:
Sorry, the same error. Trigering oat the wrong place.

I do have a pulse on L7520.
The only one that seams to don't pulse is L3095

threads.title: A1502 820-4924-A no power
threads.message:
That coil is not important.
So you get pulse on other big coils, including CPU ones?

threads.title: A1502 820-4924-A no power
threads.message:
Hi,
in the morning I had a very small pulse on L7310 and L7320, but now, I checked again to confirm it and now, I don't get a pulse on them...

threads.title: A1502 820-4924-A no power
threads.message: Can you catch any pulse at pins 7 & 3 of U1950?

threads.title: A1502 820-4924-A no power
threads.message: I get pulse on both of them

threads.title: A1502 820-4924-A no power
threads.message:
PLT_RESET_L pulsing?
Try new BIOS, just in case.

threads.title: A1502 820-4924-A no power
threads.message:
PLT_RESET_L has no pulse

Do you have a Clean BIOS for this board?

threads.title: A1502 820-4924-A no power
threads.message: [URL unfurl="true"]https://drive.google.com/file/d/18m-YhIlNhX4Uf5njH8KHmRGZelvEXnD_/view?usp=sharing[/URL]

threads.title: A1502 820-4924-A no power
threads.message:
Hi,

I've tried the new BIOS but with the same result.
No power and it has green light, when conected to the bench PSU it reaches 120 mA and imedatly drops to 15 mA

threads.title: A1502 820-4924-A no power
threads.message:
"PLT_RESET_L has no pulse"
Iy stays low, or high?
